ud3.2:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud3.2:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma nando bhagavato bhata matucchaputto sambahulanam bhikkhunam evamaroceti:
ud3.2:1.5: na sakkomi brahmacariyam sandharetum, sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattissami”ti.
ud3.2:2.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud3.2:2.2: “ayasma, bhante, nando bhagavato bhata matucchaputto sambahulanam bhikkhunam evamaroceti:
ud3.2:2.3: ‘anabhirato aham, avuso, brahmacariyam carami, na sakkomi brahmacariyam sandharetum, sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattissami’”ti.
ud3.2:3.1: Atha kho bhagava annataram bhikkhum amantesi:
ud3.2:3.2: “ehi tvam, bhikkhu, mama vacanena nandam bhikkhum amantehi:
ud3.2:3.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva yenayasma nando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam nandam etadavoca:
ud3.2:4.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma nando tassa bhikkhuno patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam nandam bhagava etadavoca:
ud3.2:5.1: “Saccam kira tvam, nanda, sambahulanam bhikkhunam evamarocesi:
ud3.2:5.2: ‘anabhirato aham, avuso, brahmacariyam carami, na sakkomi brahmacariyam sandharetum, sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattissami’”ti?
ud3.2:6.1: “Kissa pana tvam, nanda, anabhirato brahmacariyam carasi, na sakkosi brahmacariyam sandharetum, sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattissasi”ti?
ud3.2:6.2: “Sakiyani mam, bhante, janapadakalyani ghara nikkhamantassa upaddhullikhitehi kesehi apaloketva mam etadavoca:
ud3.2:6.4: So kho aham, bhante, tamanussaramano anabhirato brahmacariyam carami, na sakkomi brahmacariyam sandharetum, sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattissami”ti.
ud3.2:7.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam nandam bahayam gahetva—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam—jetavane antarahito devesu tavatimsesu paturahosi.
ud3.2:8.1: Tena kho pana samayena pancamattani accharasatani sakkassa devanamindassa upatthanam agatani honti kakutapadani.
ud3.2:8.2: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam nandam amantesi:
ud3.2:8.3: “passasi no tvam, nanda, imani panca accharasatani kakutapadani”ti?
ud3.2:9.1: “Tam kim mannasi, nanda, katama nu kho abhirupatara va dassaniyatara va pasadikatara va, sakiyani va janapadakalyani, imani va panca accharasatani kakutapadani”ti?
ud3.2:9.3: evamevam kho, bhante, sakiyani janapadakalyani imesam pancannam accharasatanam upanidhaya sankhyampi nopeti kalabhagampi nopeti upanidhimpi nopeti.
ud3.2:9.4: Atha kho imani panca accharasatani abhirupatarani ceva dassaniyatarani ca pasadikatarani ca”ti.
ud3.2:10.2: Aham te patibhogo pancannam accharasatanam patilabhaya kakutapadanan”ti.
ud3.2:10.3: “Sace me, bhante, bhagava patibhogo pancannam accharasatanam patilabhaya kakutapadanam, abhiramissamaham, bhante, bhagavati brahmacariye”ti.
ud3.2:11.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam nandam bahayam gahetva—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam—devesu tavatimsesu antarahito jetavane paturahosi.
ud3.2:12.2: “ayasma kira nando bhagavato bhata matucchaputto accharanam hetu brahmacariyam carati;
ud3.2:12.3: bhagava kirassa patibhogo pancannam accharasatanam patilabhaya kakutapadanan”ti.
ud3.2:13.1: Atha kho ayasmato nandassa sahayaka bhikkhu ayasmantam nandam bhatakavadena ca upakkitakavadena ca samudacaranti:
ud3.2:13.2: “bhatako kirayasma nando upakkitako kirayasma nando accharanam hetu brahmacariyam carati;
ud3.2:13.3: bhagava kirassa patibhogo pancannam accharasatanam patilabhaya kakutapadanan”ti.
ud3.2:14.1: Atha kho ayasma nando sahayakanam bhikkhunam bhatakavadena ca upakkitakavadena ca attiyamano harayamano jigucchamano eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
ud3.2:14.2: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
ud3.2:14.3: Annataro kho panayasma nando arahatam ahosi.
ud3.2:15.1: Atha kho annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho sa devata bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud3.2:15.2: “ayasma, bhante, nando bhagavato bhata matucchaputto asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
ud3.2:15.4: “nando asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
ud3.2:16.1: Atha kho ayasma nando tassa rattiya accayena yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma nando bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud3.2:16.2: “yam me, bhante, bhagava patibhogo pancannam accharasatanam patilabhaya kakutapadanam, muncamaham, bhante, bhagavantam etasma patissava”ti.
ud3.2:16.3: “Mayapi kho tvam, nanda, cetasa ceto paricca vidito:
ud3.2:16.4: ‘nando asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati’ti.
ud3.2:16.6: ‘ayasma, bhante, nando bhagavato bhata matucchaputto asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati’ti.
ud3.2:16.7: Yadeva kho te, nanda, anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuttam, athaham mutto etasma patissava”ti.
ud3.2:17.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
